content: *this circular afghan features spike stitch and stripes for extra texture and color lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 70629ad skill level intermediate level 3 wool-ease® article #620 5 colors 12 balls total crochet hook - size k-10 5 6 5 mm gauge rounds 1-9 = 8 in 20 5 cm diameter special stitches spike stitch long spike stitch work 68 rounds in pattern fasten_off and weave in ends to finish similar pattern to knit in wool-ease artful afghan / centerpiece treasure afghan 1 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/artful-afghan---centerpiece-treasure-afghan
